name: Suspicious WMI Reconnaissance
description: An adversary might use WMI to list Processes running on the compromised host or list installed Software hotfix and patches.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((process.executable:*\\WMIC.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:wmic.exe) AND process.command_line:(*process* OR *qfe*)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:*call* AND process.command_line:*create*)))`
